meanings.definition: A small cavity or opening in a rock formation.
meanings.sent1: The hikers found tiny vuggs in the rocky cliff.
meanings.sent2: The geologist studied the vuggs in the cave walls.
meanings.sent3: The ants made their home in the vuggs of the boulder.
meanings.sent4: The stars twinkled like vuggs in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The vuggs in the mountain looked like little windows to the world.

meanings.definition: To form small cavities or openings in a rock formation.
meanings.sent1: Over time, water can vuggs holes in the stone.
meanings.sent2: The earthquake vuggs the ground, creating new caves.
meanings.sent3: The sculptor decided to vuggs out a small niche in the statue.
meanings.sent4: The roots of the tree vuggs deep into the soil for stability.
meanings.sent5: The river vuggs through the canyon, shaping the landscape.
